sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid class="mt-5 myContainer">
    <v-card class="myCard">
      <v-row style="height:100%">
        <v-col class="containerMenuAside" sm="2">
          <menu-aside />
        </v-col>
        <v-col sm="9">
          <v-container>
            <v-row>
              <v-col>
                <InputSearchNote/>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
            <v-row>
              <v-col sm="4" v-for="item in allNotes" v-bind:key="item.idNote">
                <CardNote :title="item.noteTitle"
                          :description="item.noteDescription"
                          :date="item.date" />
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          </v-container>
          <FormNewNote @onSaveNote="saveNota"/>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
     
    </v-card>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import FormNewNote from "../components/Notes/FormNewNote.vue"
import InputSearchNote from "../components/Notes/InputSearchNote.vue"
import CardNote from "../components/Notes/CardNote.vue"
import MenuAside from "../components/MenuAside.vue";
export default {
  name: "Home",
  data: () => ({
    allNotes:[
    {
      idNote:1,
      noteTitle: "My first note",
      noteDescription: "You can now download an archive of all your data within the next 24 hours.",
      priorityLevel:'Low',
      itsDone: true,
      date: "13/09/2022"
    },
    {
      idNote:2,
      noteTitle: "My second note",
      noteDescription: "You can now download an archive of all your data within the next 24 hours.",
      priorityLevel:'Medium',
      itsDone: false,
      date: "15/09/2022"
    }],
  }),
  methods:{
    saveNota(newNota){
      this.allNotes.push(newNota)
    }
  },
  components: {
    MenuAside,
    FormNewNote,
    InputSearchNote,
    CardNote
  },
};
</script>

<style>
  .v-application--wrap{
    background: #aab8cb;
  }
  .myContainer, .myCard{
    height: 90vh !important;
  }
  .myCard{
    background-color: #F8F9FD;
  }
  .containerMenuAside{
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
  }
  .v-btn--absolute.v-btn--bottom, .v-btn--fixed.v-btn--bottom{
    bottom: 30px;
  }
  .v-btn--absolute.v-btn--right, .v-btn--fixed.v-btn--right {
    right: 30px;
  }
  /* .v-overlay__scrim{
    opacity: 0.6 !important;
  } */
</style>
